short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PasteSecure safeguards sensitive data by detecting, alerting and redacting in real-time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PasteSecure - Protect Your Sensitive Data with Intelligent Redaction

Description: PasteSecure is a powerful Chrome extension designed to protect your sensitive information by automatically detecting and redacting data during pasting. Whether youâ€™re copying personal details, financial information, or API keys, PasteSecure identifies and secures sensitive content in real time, ensuring your data remains private.

With a simple toggle-based interface, PasteSecure lets you choose which types of information to protect, such as:

Personal Identification Numbers (e.g., SSNs, Driver's Licenses)
Financial Information (e.g., Credit Card numbers, Bank Account details)
API Keys and Access Tokens (to secure your development credentials)
Cryptocurrency Wallet Addresses & seed phrases
Network Information (e.g., IP addresses)
Medical Information (for professionals handling patient data)
& more coming soon!

How It Works:

Detection on Paste: PasteSecure automatically scans clipboard content when you paste it into a text field.
Real-Time Redaction: Sensitive patterns are detected and replaced with redacted versions, protecting your data from unintended sharing.

Customizable Protection: Select specific data categories for detection, giving you full control over what gets redacted.

Visual Feedback: Get notified of detected information, with redactions happening instantly for smooth, uninterrupted workflows.

Features:
Sensitive Data Detection: Identify and redact various sensitive information types on paste, safeguarding data privacy.

Intuitive Redaction Toggle: Enable or disable redaction for specific data types based on your needs.

Real-Time Alerts: Be instantly notified when sensitive information is detected in pasted content.
User Control: Toggle protection features on/off for each data type to ensure PasteSecure fits your unique requirements.
